summary: Financial management application with PayPal integration, Stripe integration, transaction management, and admin center. Currently addressing application error in Version 64 by reverting to Version 63 (last working version) and rebuilding with targeted security changes to unblock Admin Center access while preserving data and role-based permissions.
architectural_notes: Application uses Internet Computer stable memory for data persistence across canister upgrades
Role-based permissions system exists for Admin Center security
Admin Center requires owner/admin role assignment for access
Stripe integration configured with live API keys
PayPal integration for deposits and transaction processing
known_issues: Version 64 deployment caused application error due to security guard removal
Admin Center currently blocked by authentication checks preventing owner/admin role assignment
Backend security removal attempt failed in previous build
User experiencing 'application error' message preventing app access

existing_features.title: Remove all Internet Identity authentication checks and guards that prevent access to the Admin Center page in the frontend

new_feature_requests.summary: Revert the application deployment to Version 63, which was the last stable working version before the Admin Center authentication issues occurred
Remove backend authentication and authorization checks that prevent access to Admin Center data and operations
Preserve all existing role-based permissions infrastructure and data models so security can be re-enabled after the owner assigns themselves admin/owner role
Ensure all existing user data, financial records, transaction history, deposits, connections, and balances remain completely intact and accessible after the changes
